TopicTitle: Sometime we should read wiki more

Articles.Content:
Before I read the accelerometer wiki thread, I think the accelerometer just show us some data

but wiki told me it can save fuel, that interesting:)

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Double-C_accelerometer

Attached to the side of an ascent stage this device can be used to control your acceleration during launch to provide a better and constant ascent, using less fuel for the same orbit.
The accelerometer does only show you data. Advanced players can then use data to control your ascent better, to save fuel.
Yeah the players who know how to math can use all the data given by the Science items
